channel.title: Portfolios on Pranav Iyer
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Pranav Iyer

item.title: Case study: Designing a fitness app
item.description: As a personal project I decided to design a fitness app FitTrack. This case study showcases my process in creating and designing this project.

item.title: Case study: NGO website re-design
item.description: I was tasked with re-designing the website of the NGO Proud Indian in order to improve their donations and give it a more modern look.

item.title: Illustrations
item.description: A compilation of various illustrations that I have made

item.title: UI design: Music player app
item.description: UI design of a simple music player app.
